website_summaries.verdict: Designed for serious backyard play, with regulation size net and dimensions. Fast, easy set-up and a net that pulls tight.
pros: Affordable backyard alternative to expensive pro sets
Uses special loops to restore tension quickly
cons: Larger length means the set may not fit in smaller car trunks

customer_reviews.title: Best net for under $600, VERY lightweight, 1 person= 5-10 minutes to setup.
customer_reviews.text: If you play real volleyball, this is the best net you can get under $600. VERY VERY lightweight compared to the "professional setups" that require 2 people to carry. This one weighs no more than a 4 person tent bag, which is awesome. I have 10 of these for our volleyball club, and we use them for our tournaments with AA, club level play and they hold up year after year. Very very good nets for amazing price. The bad -- order a set of professional 2" boundary lines, as the ones that come with it is just a thin string, which you COULD use, but its definitely not the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Romteni

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality and extremely easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This set is not your typical backyard family set. It is very study and easy to set up and take down with wide poles that fit inside each other and guy lines that are easily adjusted after the poles are set up for a super tight net. Three height options and good enough for competitive play. No negatives at all...
customer_reviews.author: ERIC L

customer_reviews.title: Play in 5- nice set-up
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this set is the super easy and fast set-up. My middle schooler can set this up in the back yard and play with her volleyball friends within 10 minutes. The materials seem heavy duty enough to withstand good play. Additionally, the value on amazon was superior to sporting good stores.
customer_reviews.author: S. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Not good for sand.
customer_reviews.text: First, if you are a grass player it's 5 stars. But if you play in sand it's missing the mark. First, there needs to be a base for the poles in sand. Every time one tightens the net, the net net gets lower since each pole sinks deeper into the sand. Second, if you get one grain of sand in between the collapsible poles they will not move. There needs to be a plastic bushing between the two pieces which allows for sand. At this point, I'm on the fence to send it back to Amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT your "cheesy-weak" net!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this net for my daughter as a Christmas gift. If you are looking for a sturdy net, this is it! I was afraid to purchase because I did not want the cheap kind you get everywhere in the stores. I wanted something that would be sturdy and hold the test of time and not rot after one Summer in the the sun. THIS IS A GREAT NET!!! It is very thick and does not fall over. And definitely has lasted through two summers and stood up through weathering as well!! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary A.

customer_reviews.title: Good net, easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: A quality volleyball net! Easy to setup, nice bag to carry it in and measured rope for the court. It sets up quickly and it's easy to tension the net to get good bounce and rebound action! ok, I'm not a VB player but my daughter is and we have it set to the lowest of the 3 settings and it plays really well for her.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I watched an online video for assembly which made for a faster construction time. It was a snap compared to the cheap ones. After all the comments saying it wasn't straight or tight enough at the top, I was expecting a bit of an issue. Maybe because my ground is firmer it stands straight and tight. Our family uses the net daily. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: JGP

customer_reviews.title: It is more than good enough
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best net you can get for under $300. Sure, you can get something that is more sturdy, but then you are gonna pay more, are trade off on the weight/portablility. I've used other brands, and some of the lower models that exist under the Classic. This is the best bang for the buck. Will last you years. Only thing I wish were better are the boundary lines. A thicker one made of webbing would be better, but then you'd be paying more money.
customer_reviews.author: D.K.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive, even in wind on the beach!
customer_reviews.text: REALLY impressed by this thing. I play on sand with heavy winds and the thing holds up great. Setup takes 2-3 minutes after you've done it once or twice. It actually takes longer to put the boundary lines up! For our weekly games in loose sand, we buried cinder blocks with a loop of rope. Wasnt sure the stakes would grab. Works like a charm. Tight top and bottom line - now we can play balls out of the net!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan R.

customer_reviews.title: BEST SET EVER!
customer_reviews.text: As Youth Minister of many years and host of large groups and family events, we have purchased many volleyball sets of all price ranges over the years. This is, by far, the BEST set ever! Super easy to put up; super easy to take down. High quality net, poles, cords, stakes and bag. Net does not get tangled nor do cords. Easy to choose height for the net with "push buttons" on poles. Very pleased. If we ever need another set, we will definitely order this one.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy net
customer_reviews.text: We used only twice in beach so far, it is very good and sturdy. Do not buy cheap ones, they don;'t last long and not sturdy. Everyone was impressed with quality of the net and poles. I would recommend this to serious volleyball players to play in beach or parrk. This may not be the one for everyday use though.
customer_reviews.author: Venkata S. Brundavanam

customer_reviews.title: I love the Park and Sun net
customer_reviews.text: I love the Park and Sun net, but am definitely disappointed with mine. I just bought it last month and thought that maybe I wasn't setting it up right because the net was always a bit off. After multiple uses, I determined that the net itself is just a little bit off. The webbing in one of the corners isn't even, causing one side to be wider than the other, creating tension and height discrepancies.
customer_reviews.author: Alesa

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the net last summer, but are using it regularly now during social distancing. The net is incredibly easy to put up and take down (my 6th and 8th grader do it by themselves). The only extra tool we need is a mallet to drive in the stakes. It takes about 5 minutes to put up the net with two people. Super easy.
customer_reviews.author: MMK reader

customer_reviews.title: Top Level Outdoor Net
customer_reviews.text: You can play at a professional level with this net and it is stylish and easy to assemble. I recommend keeping a hammer with you to drive the steaks into the ground. I also have to say that it isn't to easiest to travel with, but that is expected. It won't fit in a standard Sudan trunk. All in all, I'm extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent home volleyball net
customer_reviews.text: This set it great and sets up within 10-15 min. The rope court lines are marked so easy to lay down. The net goes up easy and has three height settings. Shortest works for my 12 year old then next setting for highschool age and then men’s height I’m assuming. Nets tight enough to dig a ball out of. Love it after only one use!
customer_reviews.author: momof3kids

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: This net setup is awesome! It is super easy to set up and take down. You can pull it tight enough to play off the net. I saw some reviews saying they couldn’t sinch the ropes tight enough, but I did not have this problem at all. It is totally worth the money. No need to look at other nets. This is the one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: mgulby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality "backyard" volleyball net
customer_reviews.text: This net was certainly a bit more pricey then those cheap nets you get at Walmart of Target but totally worth it. Super easy to set up and very secure. Made for a great time at a big BBQ we had in our backyard. Totally recommend as a quality net.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: be prepared to make modifications
customer_reviews.text: set it up for the first time today. its easy to transport and use. good quality. 1 of the 4 suspension ropes for the poles was frayed (see picture). Also, the there is a string through the top of the net (see picture) instead of a wire. I purchased the solo net about 3 years ago with the dual wire suspension. that works great. be prepared to make modifications to this if you buy it. i will be contacting the company hopefully to get the rope suspension replaced. i will probably need to go to a hardware store to get a wire to replace the string.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Meisinger

customer_reviews.title: What a blast!!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our kids to play and it was easy to set up and very sturdy! The lines were easy to see and use and everything was high quality. Great product and even better customer service! Highly recommend this product and company!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Blatchford

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This volleyball net is worth every penny. It takes 5 minutes to set up and less time to pack up. We bought a cheap one at the sporting good store last year and it barely made it through one set up. This net was a shockingly better upgrade. I haven’t seen a down side with this net at all so far.
customer_reviews.author: J Duke

customer_reviews.title: Net itself was made very poorly. Now I'm stuck with a bad net.
customer_reviews.text: The net is awfully loose and not worth the money spent on the product. There are no issues with assembly or sturdiness but the net was made horribly; the top portion of the net is significantly shorter than the bottom portion of the net so the net is never tight. The bottom part of the net will wave in the wind while you attempt to play a game. Hopefully all of the passes are to the setter because you can never get a ball to stick in the net and be diggable. Probably not going with Parks & Sun again.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: For the first time setting this up took about 15 minutes. It's very sturdy and made of high quality materials. We had a lot of fun playing with our granddaughter and neighbors. When we were done everything was in the carry bag and we were walking away in about 10 minutes. I highly recommend this product not only for its quality, but for its ease of setup and break down.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Well Made Net.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome net. I have quite a few friends who had given me compliments in regards to how well made it is. I have only played with the net in the grass so I cannot speak to its durability in the sand. I am not at a competitive level but I am good enough to utilize an intermediate net like this. I have no complaints so far and it seems to be holding up quite well. The bag has ample room to carry everything in the bag. I purchased this one because it had the handled guy wires instead of the metal ring. I think I made the right choice because I have had no issues with slippage.
customer_reviews.author: faruna

customer_reviews.title: Second One I have Purchased
customer_reviews.text: Second one I have purchased for work in 2 years. I am not the one using it, but it seems to fit our needs perfectly for a grass volleyball net for elementary (5-6 grade) volleyball teams. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: CG2009

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality net for back yard
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter this summer. Due to great weather, was able to leave it up through November. Daughter likes volleyball so much that she played in the back yard almost every evening, which dramatically improved her game. Can't wait to take it to the park for a family picnic. Very good quality...I expect this thing to last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Tight net, easy setup.  Anchors bend too easily.
customer_reviews.text: I like my Park & Sun Spectrum Classic Volleyball Net system. It's easy to setup. The net is tight and sturdy and holds up to vigorous play. The anchor stakes are soft so their strike heads will bend if struck improperly by a hammer. I bent the strike heads on two of the stakes while anchoring them into grass-covered turf (they straightened later with some deliberate hammering.)
customer_reviews.author: David A. Kott

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this net
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this net! The new is structurally sound and a breeze to set up. I have yet to set it up in sand but in grass it is quick and painless. I am an avid volleyball player and this net fits perfectly in the trunk of my car without taking up too much room!
customer_reviews.author: B. Falero

customer_reviews.title: Great volley ball set
customer_reviews.text: Well made easy to set up. Great product. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a quality outdoor volley ball set.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fauth

customer_reviews.title: Best grass net ever
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the best grass net ever. It does cost extra but definitely better quality than other ones. The stacks are longer & ticker and so are the ropes. The net is already tied at the top so it doesnt drip down. On cheaper nets you have to tie it yourself and sometimes the screw breaks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still a great net!
customer_reviews.text: Park and Sun has been the 'go to' net for grass volleyball for as long as I've been playing. They're still making great nets.
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: Great net
customer_reviews.text: Love this net! Very easy to assemble. Due to weather, if you leave it up for an extended period of time the bottom part of the net will fill with water and make it sag, but it’s easy to dump out. We just lay the net on the ground when we’re done using it and pop it back up when we want to play- very easy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could Not Be Happier.  Love This Net!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple summers ago and have used it a LOT. I doubt you find a better net for the money. It holds up to anything, stays tight as when you set it up and wind has no effect on it. It's also great fun to setup at the park, next to a group of volley-ballers who settled on the $80 department store net.. thinking it was the best around. They'll be asking you all about this one by the time you're done playing. It's a pro net and if you play a lot, it's the net you want to get. It's been the standard for years and years.. and for good reason.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShoppingAddict

customer_reviews.title: its a decent net but the tensioning handles are cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: its a decent net but the tensioning handles are cheap....they break,,,,,and need to be reinforced so they don't break. Mine broke on the first set up...I would have given one star, but amazon allows to return....so I'm going to attempt to reinforce the next ones prior to set up to prevent failure.
customer_reviews.author: vadim kasko

customer_reviews.title: Very strong and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this set. Only knock is the court lines. My cheaper set from Baden had better barrier.
customer_reviews.author: Mesa Youth Sports

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, User Friendly Volleyball Set-Up
customer_reviews.text: This volleyball net set-up was exactly what I wanted. Easy to set-up and sturdy to handle athletic teenager games. When I was researching this item I wasn't clear on how or if the posts themselves were secured to the ground, they are not. The yellow support chords do an excellent job making the net tight and keeping the poles in place.
customer_reviews.author: Birgit Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Good but not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good product but Not the color that is advertised or that I wanted/purchased. Unable to get the right color from company. I tried many times but was told just to return product and buy something else. The set is good.
customer_reviews.author: sballengee

customer_reviews.title: Great for family fun or activities
customer_reviews.text: Was looking to purchase a set to put up in our yard for gatherings, family or youth activities, etc. Just put this up yesterday and is already so much fun and looks like it will last for a long time. Also seems pretty easy to transport. Looking forward to putting it to use this summer!!
customer_reviews.author: AandN

customer_reviews.title: Great quality volleyball set!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our upcoming beach vacation. We love playing volleyball but can never seem to get a new when we want it so we purchased this and took it with us this year. We had a blast, it was easy to set up and held up to many hours of men playing volleyball. We have used it is in our backyard as well as on the beach so far and each time it sets up quickly and comes down easily s well. We love the quality and all of the items that came with this as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Pols

customer_reviews.title: Volleyball anyone!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome netting system. The setup and teardown is simple. We used the system on the beach with a Park & Sun auger system and it worked like a champ. Many beach goers were asking how to get a similar system. If you like volleyball, you will not be disappointed with this set. Love, love, love the storage/carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Blackhawk

customer_reviews.title: Great VBall system... and quick set up
customer_reviews.text: This is a great system for the company picnic, backyard game or even for the more serious players. Once we set it up it held up just fine. No problems at all. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: D Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Best volleyball net ever
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed how easy it was to set this up - I can do it myself, just one person required. So sturdy and firm, and my kids notice that! Love the boundary cord, that is a huge plus for our family to argue in/out!
customer_reviews.author: CMC

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and takedown  High quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and we have used it several times. great for having friends over in the yard, or when we went to an family gathering at a park. very easy for 2 people to set up and take down. Very sturdy. The travel bag holds everything well. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Peter VanZwoll

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put up and down
customer_reviews.text: Literally all you need is a hammer to hammer in the stakes, and even then, you might not even need it depending how soft the sand/grass you're playing on is. Very easy to assemble (2 people). And easy to take down. I love this net!
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Great net! Not in sand.
customer_reviews.text: Quality net, good boundaries, very convenient bag. You will need longer stakes if you want to use it in sand, but everything else about it is good. Make sure you follow the instructions for setup so you get the net properly tight and secure.
customer_reviews.author: GunnaReview

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.text: The best quality net system from Park and Sun. I wouldn't buy the cheaper ones as I have tried them and they just feel much cheaper than this. It's worth the extra money and will last you for years. I have replaced the stakes with longer ones and have bought a little mallet to drive them in.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bird

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is more expensive than the other nets but a much higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: If you are sick of screwing around with cheap sets that break, step it up and get this. it sets up fast and it great for tournaments or just playing. Very light and portable and nice to play with on grass. It is regulation size so you need a big area- you can't just set it up in your little yard. You need regulation area to play in. Great for serious players too. I used to do tournaments and this is what they used back then and probably use now. Nice and tight net.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Solid, easy to assemble and adjust, volleyball system
customer_reviews.text: Strong, easy to assemble, and easy to adjust (i.e. net height and net tension) volleyball system. I think this product will satisfy the needs of everyone with the exception of hardcore A players, who are willing to pay much more, and transport a much heavier and more complicated system.
customer_reviews.author: Daneo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Net
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this net is fantastic! The outer bands are thick and sturdy, the setup is quick and much easier than the competition. I can see this net being used for years to come provided it is taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy set
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy set. We use it in the back yard just about every week and it's fast and east to set up and take down. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic net at a great price! Best net for all the grass volleyball players!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best bang for your buck. I grew up with one of these and they last forever. My parents still have it and I had to get my own. Full sized, extremely durable! Never had a problem with this net at all. It’s a great price, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cory and Shayna Jones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! So easy to set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very sturdy, easy to set up and take down. One person could do it but so much easier with two people. Only takes about 5 minutes total to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: A mom

customer_reviews.title: Tough net!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great strong durable net. I'm a coach and I use this to train outdoors. For the price you can't beat this. It's quick to set up once you get the hang of it. I had one a couple years back that we set up and left outside for about 3 years. The weather eventually destroyed it but it lasted. If you put it up and take it down and don't leave it out in the sun and rain for long periods, it'll last for many more years.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set Up
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality. So Easy to Set up, put away and carry around.
customer_reviews.author: ayme torres

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: We have been playing multiple times a week this summer. Set up and take down easy with slip secure handles. Also helps in pulling net tight. Love this net.
customer_reviews.author: coachflanny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect volleyball net!
customer_reviews.text: Great Net! Sets up quickly as advertised and the adjusting tension functions perfectly. All packed back up in the bag for neat storage. Perfect for a portable volleyball game or just a quick set up in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: When it rains, water collected in the bottom fo the net, and it sagged. Drilled small drain holes in bottom of net and solved the problem. My net was ruined when I left it out during a noreaster, my fault though. I will probably be ordering another one in the near future. Good quality net
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sacco

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to set up this set. Simple and very solidly built. Was able to set up at the beach and get a game going in 10 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Richard K. Eldredge

customer_reviews.title: Read instructions
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly as advertised & easy to set up. It does sag a little bit in the middle when left up for extended periods of time but easy very easily tightened up.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby F.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for Grandma to give to my son for his graduation - Quick & Easy shipping. Took us about 6 minutes to set up - it's a nice set, holds a good amount of tension. Carry bag holds all. Only recommendation is to purchase a camping mallet (a mini but sturdy rubber mallet) to put in the bag to make driving the spikes in a bit easier and more effective depending on where you set it up.
customer_reviews.author: mbcincy

customer_reviews.title: Truly a great piece of equipment if you like to play vball ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredible how this thing sets up in the middle of nowhere. Truly a great piece of equipment if you like to play vball anywhere, any time
customer_reviews.author: Jmo

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with this net. We took it to some friends the first day we got it, and they ordered one on the spot. It just really works good. Quick to set up and take down. It's big, full size.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Conrad

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent net system
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent net system! We use it all the time! It's obviously made of high quality materials. A friend of mine has a park and sun net and it works good but it's a cheaper version and this one is much nicer to use! Spend the extra coin and get this one if you're planning to use it much!
customer_reviews.author: Fermundy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy to assemble and disassemble and adjustable. It was used for a picnic and had a blast with it. It was durable and surprisingly sturdy considering the way it is put together.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge151

customer_reviews.title: Awesome package
customer_reviews.text: Awesome net!! No instructions needed, and everything that you need is right in the bag. All the stakes are tied, and everything lines up well. Also all the stakes are tied and the net is so easy to adjust. Love this net. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very solid design!
customer_reviews.text: This net is so easy to put up, and it has a really solid design. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Jade Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and incorrect product description
customer_reviews.text: The net system is good. I have the exact same system ordered from another website. However, the one I ordered on Amazon arrived damaged and not correct per product description. The item was returned and a "new" one arrived. It was the same one I returned as damaged.
customer_reviews.author: J Kwan

customer_reviews.title: Terrific volleyball set!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great setting up on the grass. Balls can even bounce off the net to some extent. We haven't tried it indoors yet, but plan to. Tripping over the boundary or the rope holding the net is the only problem I have seen and I can't see how that could be changed.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret T.

customer_reviews.title: Great net, might buy another...
customer_reviews.text: Love this net and probably will be in the market for another soon. It is a sturdy, all in one solution to your volleyball needs (Hammer and volleyball not included). Stakes, everything is self explanatory with a red ring around the center line of the court. Takes a few times to figure out getting the poles up just right. Can be set up for lower sizes as well for female/male nets and even junior volleyball!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Very rugged and easy to set up....and it stays up
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Did not think this net would be this good. I rolled out the end because it doesn’t fit my whole yard but still hold up nicely!
customer_reviews.author: mari

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy. Net stays put and doesn't sag like the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who wanted to play volleyball in the back yard. But, I didn't want to be replacing it every few weeks by buying a cheapo set. This fit the bill. Well made and sturdy. Net stays put and doesn't sag like the cheaper nets always do. The whole family can enjoy it. Best of all it packs neatly into it's own case ! Love this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Pasquale

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: One of the pull guy lines is a bit frayed, other than that it is a great product! Is it possible to get a replacement!
customer_reviews.author: FS

customer_reviews.title: Volleyball net
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband, and he absolutely loves it. The only problem we had was that the pull-down guylines don't hold very well and slip off making the net loose. The color is very beautiful compared to all the others we see on the fields.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: After having owned cheap ones and as my kids got stronger and tearing it up, I finally broke down and bought this one and could not be more please. Very good quality materials and heavy duty. Looking forward to a LOT of games on this one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lamm

customer_reviews.title: Professional Net!
customer_reviews.text: Professional net at a great price! Awesome color, easy to assemble and strong!
customer_reviews.author: D. Weis

customer_reviews.title: pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice net. Heavy duty enough to play competitively. This net is made to take up and down not leave set up permanently.
customer_reviews.author: Montoya clan

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to set up. I just set it up so I cannot rate it for durability but I have been very impressed so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren love volley This was an excellent purchase as they can it anyplace Easy set up
customer_reviews.author: June Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: A Great Portable Net for Semi-Serious Play.
customer_reviews.text: Simple to put up and very robust. NOT the terrible sort of combination badminton/volleyball net. Instead this is an easy to put up, good quality net. Put a hammer in the bag with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and easy to setup. Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, enjoyed using this with my small team. How do I get parts if it's broken? the net tension nylon ropes are broken by accident. Is it possible to get only the net tension ropes and boundary cables I don't want to buy another full set for these parts.
customer_reviews.author: anu ajo

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Net System
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this recently from Amazon and couldn't be happier about the purchase. I've used the net several times and found it very convenient to set up: unravel net, click-adjust legs to one of three heights, pound in stakes, pull guylines taught by simple use of a handle, and set the boundary. Very, very simple, especially when compared to the cheapo discount store variety of net systems. I've purchased several of those over the years, and found them all to be a royal pain to set up. With the Spectrum Classic, it's easy, and I know I've purchased the last system I'll need for the next 15 years or so.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Competition level quality and quick set up
customer_reviews.text: Competition level quality and Super easy to set up. I was able to set it up with no help. With a partner it takes no more than 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Floppy top tape, almost impossible to set up without ...
customer_reviews.text: Floppy top tape, almost impossible to set up without slack. Net started to rip/stitching coming undone. That being said...I've been using this net for nearly 4 years
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: This product has been great so far! Easy set up with two people, sturdy with many kids hitting balls into it. My daughter loves it for practicing!
customer_reviews.author: Momofthree

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and built to last. Great net tension
customer_reviews.author: DBS44

customer_reviews.title: Good advice. Net was quality and carrying case very ...
customer_reviews.text: purchased for a party at the beach - also purchased Sunnydaze 16 Inch Yellow Spiral Anchor to secure in the sand upon the suggestion of a previous reviewer. Good advice. Net was quality and carrying case very convenient. Easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth F.

customer_reviews.title: A winner
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a sturdy canvas bag which makes it great for storage and transport. Very easy to set up and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: V. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: This volleyball net is great, high quality and easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, so easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: So with the money! So easy to use in our yard
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Smeltzer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: This will last for years. Won’t melt in the sun like plastic will. Worth the extra spent.
customer_reviews.author: sherry parham

customer_reviews.title: Great for backyard vb
customer_reviews.text: Great for backyard vb! We use it for big groups mostly ages 13-18 so it takes a beating and holds up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for competitive play
customer_reviews.text: Had to adjust the string on the top because the tape sagged. It's great now!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: "Great Net" "Bad Stakes"
customer_reviews.text: All the components are of good quality with the exception of the "Stakes". Although the Stakes are the right size (12" long), the steel is too soft and bends very easily. Park & Sun should consider improving the stakes to something useful. I rated this product only 4 starts because of the poor quality of the stakes. Otherwise, it's a great net.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: Great buying experience
customer_reviews.text: We got this product for high school volleyball practice outdoors. We are very pleased with the product and the seller went above and beyond to help us. Top notch seller!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Very easy to set up. Very professional. I am extremely happy with the purchase. I felt that spending the extra money was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best nets out there for the price
customer_reviews.text: Tournament quality. One of the best nets out there for the price. I use it at least once a week and it's holding up, durable. Yes top could be tightened if you add your own adjustments and it will be more stiff but that's if you want to go the extra mile.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: This product is perfect for some summer fun in the sun
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for some summer fun in the sun. Very easy to setup and breakdown; can do it with one person. Very durable and strong net system. Have gotten lots of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding net. Does sag a little towards the middle ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding net. Does sag a little towards the middle, but the bounce back of the ball in the net is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Ki Yang

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO SET UP!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s really easy to set up!! The nails are pretty durable, but tip when setting up in the grass look for hard ground because it tends to get loose when u nail it down on soft grass
customer_reviews.author: Justin

product_meta.title: Park & Sun Sports Spectrum Classic: Portable Professional Outdoor Volleyball Net System
product_meta.description: The Park & Sun Sports Spectrum Classic portable outdoor volleyball net system is our flagship set for professional, tournament-level volleyball. This set is a perennial favorite of tournament directors and competitive players alike. This volleyball net system is designed with premium, powder-coated telescopic aluminum poles that measure 2" in diameter. These 2-piece poles feature a push-button locking system, allowing you to easily adjust the net to men's (8'), women's (7' 4") and co-ed (7' 8") playing heights. The Park & Sun Sports Spectrum Classic volleyball net system features our regulation size Spectrum net, which measures 32' L x 3' H, and is pre-attached to the poles. This nylon net has 3" top and bottom tapes with reinforced corners and is equipped with convenient 6" side sleeves, which distributes the net tension evenly from the top to the bottom of the net. Nylon netting is superior at withstanding harsh weather compared to lower-end polyethylene (PE) nets, so you can enjoy the game for years to come. The 5/16" double guyline with padded pull down handles allow for quick adjustments that ensure the net remains taut, even during rough play. For added stability, (4) 12" forged steel ground stakes are also included. Define your court with the 5/16" diameter, pre-measured boundary (60' L x 30' W) which is firmly secured to the ground with corner anchors. When not in use, the cord winder keeps the boundary wrapped up without tangles. This entire set fits inside a heavy-duty 1800 denier polyester zippered equipment bag with carrying handles; making transporting and storing extremely convenient.
feature_bullets: Telescopic, 2-piece aluminum poles measure 2" in diameter; Push-button pole locking system adjusts to men's, women's and co-ed playing heights
Features a regulation size (32' L x 3' H) Spectrum net; Nylon net has 3" top and bottom tapes with reinforced corners and side sleeves for even net tension
5/16" double guyline with padded pull down handles allow for quick adjustments that ensure the net remains taut, even during rough play
Define your court with the 5/16" diameter, pre-measured boundary (60' L x 30' W) which is firmly secured to the ground with corner anchors
Entire set fits inside a heavy-duty, 1800 denier polyester zippered equipment bag with carrying handles, making transporting and storing extremely convenient
